ESPECIALLY FOR WEDDINGS AND MEMORABLE TABLES

Let us elevate your dining and entertainment experience with our curated collection of custom artisanal tableware hand painted in Paris, France on Limoges porcelain.  Made to mix not just to match, each collection designed by Marie Daage Paris is available in a range of more than 68 colors from which endless combinations can be created.  Each piece is meticulously crafted to transform every meal into a memorable occasion.  Explore our range of uniquely designed and expertly made tableware that adds an extra touch of elegance to your table.  Whether just a few pieces to compliment what you already have or an entire new range of dinnerware, let Sassafras Designs help you create your very own custom tableware that will be uniquely yours! 

Especially for Brides
